{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#少女歌剧##佐藤日向# 你的生日是东京塔完工纪念日，总让人感觉这其中一定有什么缘分。
年纪在九九组是绝对的妹妹，总是天不怕地不怕地要求成员们做这样那样的奇怪事。
做偶像的经验在九九组数一数二，对自己的高标准高要求倒是完全没有一点小孩子的娇气。
记得你以前的日志提到过，本来你的嗓音没有这么低沉，但是练唱歌不分日夜，才让嗓音多了份厚实。
小日向生日快乐，感谢你与九九组相伴成长🎂","id":45463269,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1080,"img_size":327.28,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/78d17fcae3cd233337a5bd07be68f9bce3a7eaaa.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1441},{"img_height":960,"img_size":119.95,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/c667619b2f7989d8e4c096adb35546bf484db1ab.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1280},{"img_height":1024,"img_size":148.45,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/9916da8db1ea9e4addac1c48dc2e2cbe6914a1c8.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":767},{"img_height":480,"img_size":34.01,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/b4337a6741674ee55265172fc46aa0b7a6a0c960.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":360},{"img_height":1024,"img_size":145.1,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/02afc3706f5f74ee63a0a64104845c9066c5dfcc.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":768}],"pictures_count":5,"reply":55,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1577083584},"user":{"head_url":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
